head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAGRO, NANCY POST

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAGRO, NANCY POST

block.p: MAGRO-Nancy Post of Camden, ME. Surviving: sons Jonathan P. Magro (Cinc, OH), Benjamin Magro (Appleton, ME), daughters, Rev. Susan Pfeil (New Canaan, CT), Nancy Magro (Windham, NH); brother, George Post (Norwalk, CT); halfbrother, Ethan Emery (Mexico); half - sisters, Irene Goodale (Atlanta, GA); Lela Steele (Cinc., OH); nine grandchildren. Predeceased by husband of 55 yrs., John L. Magro, daughter Dr. Victoria Pfeil, half-sister, Melissa Lanier. Celebration of Life 11AM, April 12, 2003 at John St. Methodist Church. Laite Funeral Home, 207-236-0092
